posts.post_content:
Im looking to buy them in SGC or PSA 1-3 grades.1933 Goudey Babe Ruths. Any card is fine and they can be the same card. Im looking to buy one for a gift and one for myself. Please let me know what you have or if you know who has one. Ive looked at the ones on ebay and I may buy one of them but they just dont stand out really. Hope you guys can help.
Thanks
Derek
